vulns.details: In buildPropFile of filesystem.go, there is a possible insecure hash due to an improperly used crypto. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.

In multiple locations, there is a possible permission bypass due to a confused deputy. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.

In rebootRecoveryWithCommand of RecoverySystemService.java, there is a possible way to bypass a factory reset due to a logic error in the code. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is needed for exploitation.
